Symbol.Script_3D:
! Single Package Heat Pump
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen
unID = 1 IF mbShow THEN
! --- HOTSPOTS --- !
HOTSPOT A/2, B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, B/2, ZZYZX-grillHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B/2, ZZYZX-grillHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B/2, ZZYZX-grillHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, B/2, ZZYZX-grillHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
ADD -A/2, -B/2, 0 BLOCK A, B, ZZYZX-grillHeight DEL 1
! --- GRILL --- !
dist = MIN(A/2, B/2) dist2 = MAX(A, B)
ww = 0: dd = 0 IF (dist2-A)<EPS THEN ww = 1 IF (dist2-B)<EPS THEN dd = 1
FOR k=1 TO 1+((dist2-dist*2)>grillDia*1.05) ADD -A/2+dist+(dist2-dist*2)*(k-1)*ww, B/2-dist-(dist2-dist*2)*(k-1)*dd, ZZYZX-grillHeight
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN GOSUB 500 ELSE ADD -grillDia/2, -grillDia/2, 0 BLOCK grillDia, grillDia, grillHeight DEL 1 ENDIF
DEL 1 NEXT k ENDIF
RESOL res
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 17, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 17 END
500: SegmetAng = 360/SegmentsNum SegmetHalfAng = SegmetAng/2 TotalInsideRad = Rad-HalfThick/TAN(SegmetHalfAng)-Thick DivisionInsideDist = (TotalInsideRad-Thick*(DivisionNum-1))/DivisionNum
ADDz grillHeight ROTz SegmetHalfAng
PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT Rad, 360, 4001
alpha = 0 FOR i = 1 TO SegmentsNum InsideDist = DivisionInsideDist CenterPointPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) CenterPointPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) FOR j = 1 TO DivisionNum InsideDist = InsideDist+Thick*(j>1) PointOnArcEndPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) PointOnArcEnd2PosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) PointOnArcEndPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) PointOnArcEnd2PosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)
IF j = 1 THEN PUT CenterPointPosX, CenterPointPosY, 1 PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT PointOnArcEnd2PosX, PointOnArcEnd2PosY, 3001 PUT CenterPointPosX, CenterPointPosY, -1 ELSE InsideDist = InsideDist+DivisionInsideDist OPointOnArcEndPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) OPointOnArcEnd2PosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) OPointOnArcEndPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) OPointOnArcEnd2PosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)
PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT PointOnArcEnd2PosX, PointOnArcEnd2PosY, 3001 PUT OPointOnArcEnd2PosX, OPointOnArcEnd2PosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT OPointOnArcEndPosX, OPointOnArcEndPosY, 3001 PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, -1 ENDIF NEXT j alpha = alpha+SegmetAng NEXT i
POLY_ NSP/3,
GET(NSP)
DEL 2
FOR i = 1 TO SegmentsNum/2 ROTz (360/SegmentsNum)*i ROTx 90 PUT grillDia/2, 0, 1 PUT grillDia/2, grillHeight-0.001, 1 PUT -grillDia/2, grillHeight-0.001, 1 PUT -grillDia/2, 0, 1 PUT -grillDia/2+Thick, 0, 1 PUT -grillDia/2+Thick, grillHeight-0.001-Thick, 1 PUT grillDia/2-Thick, grillHeight-0.001-Thick, 1 PUT grillDia/2-Thick, 0, 1
POLY_ NSP/3,
GET(NSP) DEL 2 NEXT i RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Single Package Heat Pump
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
HOTSPOT2 A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1
PUT A/2, B/2, 1, A/2, -B/2, 1, -A/2, -B/2, 1, -A/2, B/2, 1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
! --- GRILL --- !
dist = MIN(A/2, B/2) dist2 = MAX(A, B)
ww = 0: dd = 0 IF (dist2-A)<EPS THEN ww = 1 IF (dist2-B)<EPS THEN dd = 1
FOR k=1 TO 1+((dist2-dist*2)>grillDia*1.05) ADD2 -A/2+dist+(dist2-dist*2)*(k-1)*ww, B/2-dist-(dist2-dist*2)*(k-1)*dd GOSUB 500 DEL 1 NEXT k
SET FILL gs_fill_type
PEN gs_cont_pen IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1, mbShow = 0 PEN gs_cont_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1, mbShow = 0 ENDIF
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 -SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED))+SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND SYMB_MIRRORED)
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConShow_1 = 0, ConEdit_1 = 13, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConShow_2 = 0, ConEdit_2 = 13 DEL 1
END
500: SegmetAng = 360/SegmentsNum SegmetHalfAng = SegmetAng/2 TotalInsideRad = Rad-HalfThick/TAN(SegmetHalfAng)-Thick DivisionInsideDist = (TotalInsideRad-Thick*(DivisionNum-1))/DivisionNum
ROT2 SegmetHalfAng
PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT Rad, 360, 4001
alpha = 0 FOR i = 1 TO SegmentsNum InsideDist = DivisionInsideDist CenterPointPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) CenterPointPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) FOR j = 1 TO DivisionNum InsideDist = InsideDist+Thick*(j>1) PointOnArcEndPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) PointOnArcEnd2PosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) PointOnArcEndPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) PointOnArcEnd2PosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)
IF j = 1 THEN PUT CenterPointPosX, CenterPointPosY, 1 PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT PointOnArcEnd2PosX, PointOnArcEnd2PosY, 3001 PUT CenterPointPosX, CenterPointPosY, -1 ELSE InsideDist = InsideDist+DivisionInsideDist OPointOnArcEndPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) OPointOnArcEnd2PosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) OPointOnArcEndPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) OPointOnArcEnd2PosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)
PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT PointOnArcEnd2PosX, PointOnArcEnd2PosY, 3001 PUT OPointOnArcEnd2PosX, OPointOnArcEnd2PosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT OPointOnArcEndPosX, OPointOnArcEndPosY, 3001 PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, -1 ENDIF NEXT j alpha = alpha+SegmetAng NEXT i
POLY2_ NSP/3, 1,
GET(NSP)
DEL 1 RETURN
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Single Package Heat Pump
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
grillDia = MIN(0.72, A-0.065, B-0.065) grillHeight = 0.03 Rad = grillDia/2-0.03 Thick = 0.01 HalfThick = Thick/2 SegmentsNum = 8 DivisionNum = 4
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Single Package Heat Pump
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[2] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Single Package Heat Pump
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF A < 0.20 THEN A = 0.20 VALUES "A" RANGE [0.20, ] IF B < 0.20 THEN B = 0.20 VALUES "B" RANGE [0.20, ] IF ZZYZX < ConWidth_1+ConWidth_2+grillHeight THEN ZZYZX = ConWidth_1+ConWidth_2+grillHeight VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [ConWidth_1+ConWidth_2+grillHeight, ] ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 2
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #1`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, MIN(B/2, (ZZYZX-grillHeight)/2)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConWidth_1 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_1" VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0, ]
PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = -A/2 VALUES "ConPosY_1" RANGE [-B/2+ConWidth_1/2, B/2-ConWidth_1/2] VALUES "ConPosZ_1" RANGE [ConWidth_1/2, ZZYZX-grillHeight-ConWidth_1/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #2`
ConDVecX = -1 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 0 ConWVecY = -1 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, MIN(B/2, (ZZYZX-grillHeight)/2)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConWidth_2 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_2" VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0, ]
PARAMETERS ConPosX_2 = -A/2 VALUES "ConPosY_2" RANGE [-B/2+ConWidth_2/2, B/2-ConWidth_2/2] VALUES "ConPosZ_2" RANGE [ConWidth_2/2, ZZYZX-grillHeight-ConWidth_2/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
values "FM_HeatOutput_unit" `З`, `БТЕ/час` values "FM_RefrigeratingOutput_unit" `З`, `БТЕ/час`
if FM_HeatOutput_unit = `БТЕ/час` then hideparameter "FM_HeatOutput" else hideparameter "FM_HeatOutput_btu" endif
if FM_RefrigeratingOutput_unit = `БТЕ/час` then hideparameter "FM_RefrigeratingOutput" else hideparameter "FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu" endif
!1000 W = 3414,426 Btu/hour if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "FM_HeatOutput_btu" then FM_HeatOutput = FM_HeatOutput_btu / 3.414426 parameters FM_HeatOutput = FM_HeatOutput else FM_HeatOutput_btu = FM_HeatOutput * 3.414426 parameters FM_HeatOutput_btu = FM_HeatOutput_btu endif
!1000 W = 3414,426 Btu/hour if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu" then FM_RefrigeratingOutput = FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu / 3.414426 parameters FM_RefrigeratingOutput = FM_RefrigeratingOutput else FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu = FM_RefrigeratingOutput * 3.414426 parameters FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu = FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu endif
